meanings: a major war, a massive war.
the greatest war on record[in history, ever fought]

examples.korean: If something is spotted late and is big enough, we might come into Armageddon type scenarios where we may have to look at manned missions to deflect it. 발음듣기 만약 무언가 큰 것이 늦게 발견된다면, 우리는 그것의 방향을 바꾸기 위해 유인 미션을 수행해야 하는 아마겟돈 (지구 종말을 초래할 듯한 대전쟁) 같은 시나리오에 맞닥뜨리게 될지도 모릅니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: If something is spotted late and is big enough, we might come into Armageddon type scenarios where we may have to look at manned missions to deflect it. 발음

examples.korean: a big battle at the north of the Liaotung Peninsula 발음듣기 요동반도 북부서의 대전쟁. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: a big battle at the north of the Liaotung Peninsula 발음
